name: Pipedream Workflow Integration
description: Execute Pipedream workflows and connect to 1000+ APIs. Trigger external actions, process data, and integrate with any service through Pipedream's powerful automation platform.
author: @anythingllm-community

input.hint: Your Pipedream API key from https://pipedream.com/settings/account
Pre-configured workflow endpoints (name:url format, one per line)
Default timeout for workflow execution in seconds
Allow asynchronous workflow execution for long-running tasks
Pipedream API base URL (usually don't need to change)

examples.prompt: Send a message to Slack using my Pipedream workflow
Trigger my email automation workflow with customer data
Get the status of my data processing workflow
Execute my Twitter posting workflow with new content
examples.call: {"action": "execute_workflow", "workflow_name": "twitter-post", "data": {"tweet_text": "Exciting news from our AI project!", "include_image": false}}

action.description: Action to perform: execute_workflow, list_workflows, get_workflow_status, create_webhook

workflow_name.description: Name of the pre-configured workflow to execute

workflow_url.description: Direct URL of the Pipedream workflow endpoint

workflow_id.description: Pipedream workflow ID for status checking

data.description: Data payload to send to the workflow (JSON object as string)

headers.description: Custom headers for the workflow request (JSON object as string)

method.description: HTTP method for the workflow request (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)

timeout.description: Custom timeout for this workflow execution in seconds

webhook_name.description: Name for creating a new webhook

event_type.description: Type of event to trigger the webhook
